content.rendered: You have two more days to get our 20% discount on select AVA trips. Check out our wide selection of Colorado river rafting trips! And see all of the other Colorado summer activities we offer. You can even get 20% off our Colorado rock climbing trips! Don't miss your chance to have an adventure-packed summer! Use promo code raft2010 to book online.  See ya this summer!
